The scope management plan outlines how the project team will define, validate, and control the project scope. When a team member discovers a change in requirements during a task, it directly impacts the project scope. Therefore, the scope management plan should be consulted to determine the process for managing scope changes. This plan typically includes procedures for change requests, impact assessments, and approval processes.
